markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cat's Eye Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=85)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

After you consume this elixir, your vision sharpens and you become sensitive to even the most minute movements. For the next minute, you reduce the flat check to target hidden creatures to 5, and you don’t need to attempt a flat check to target concealed creatures. These benefits apply only against creatures within 30 feet of you. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cat's Eye Elixir
